trans-unit.source: How to use Azure PowerShell Command to create an empty Cloud Service container
trans-unit.target: How to use Azure PowerShell Command to create an empty Cloud Service container

trans-unit.source: This article explains how to create Cloud Service container and perform Cloud Service related management operations using PowerShell script
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to create Cloud Service container and perform Cloud Service related management operations using PowerShell script

trans-unit.source: How to use Azure PowerShell Command to create an empty Cloud Service container
trans-unit.target: How to use Azure PowerShell Command to create an empty Cloud Service container

trans-unit.source: Install Microsoft Azure PowerShell cmdlet from [download Azure PowerShell](http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9811175&clcid=0x409).
trans-unit.target: Install Microsoft Azure PowerShell cmdlet from [download Azure PowerShell](http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9811175&clcid=0x409).

trans-unit.source: For further instruction installing Azure PowerShell cmdlet and connecting to you Azure subscription, please refer to [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](../powershell-install-configure.md).
trans-unit.target: For further instruction installing Azure PowerShell cmdlet and connecting to you Azure subscription, please refer to [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](../powershell-install-configure.md).

trans-unit.source: **New-AzureService** is the cmdlet to create an empty Cloud Service container.
trans-unit.target: **New-AzureService** is the cmdlet to create an empty Cloud Service container.

trans-unit.source: An example invoking the cmdlet is:
trans-unit.target: An example invoking the cmdlet is:

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating Azure Cloud Service, please run:
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating Azure Cloud Service, please run:

trans-unit.source: To manage the Cloud Service deployment, please refer to [Get-AzureService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn495131.aspx), [Remove-AzureService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn495120.aspx), and [Set-AzureService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn495242.aspx) commands.
trans-unit.target: To manage the Cloud Service deployment, please refer to [Get-AzureService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn495131.aspx), [Remove-AzureService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn495120.aspx), and [Set-AzureService](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn495242.aspx) commands.

trans-unit.source: Also please refer to [How to Configure Cloud Services](cloud-services-how-to-configure.md)
trans-unit.target: Also please refer to [How to Configure Cloud Services](cloud-services-how-to-configure.md)

trans-unit.source: To publish your Cloud Service project to Azure, please refer to **PublishCloudService.ps1** code sample from [Continuous Delivery for Cloud Service in Azure](cloud-services-dotnet-continuous-delivery.md)
trans-unit.target: To publish your Cloud Service project to Azure, please refer to **PublishCloudService.ps1** code sample from [Continuous Delivery for Cloud Service in Azure](cloud-services-dotnet-continuous-delivery.md)
